com.novell.ldapchai.exception
Class ChaiPasswordPolicyException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.novell.ldapchai.exception.ChaiPasswordPolicyException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ChaiPasswordPolicyException
extends Exception

Password policy exceptions. Thrown when a password does not match a password policy for some reason.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

forErrorCode

public static ChaiPasswordPolicyException forErrorCode(int errorCode)
Creates a ChaiPasswordPolicyException based on an eDirectory error code.

Parameters:
errorCode - an eDirectory error code
Returns:
A ChaiPasswordPolicyException with a PASSWORD_ERROR that matches the supplied error code, or ChaiPasswordPolicyException.PASSWORD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR if the error can not be matched.

forErrorMessage

public static ChaiPasswordPolicyException forErrorMessage(String errorString)
Creates a ChaiPasswordPolicyException based on an eDirectory found inside the String error.

Parameters:
errorString - a string with an eDirectory error code contained inside the string
Returns:
A ChaiPasswordPolicyException with a PASSWORD_ERROR that matches the supplied error code, or ChaiPasswordPolicyException.PASSWORD_ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR if the error can not be matched.

getPasswordError

public ChaiPasswordPolicyException.PASSWORD_ERROR getPasswordError()
Get the cause of the error

Returns:
the cause of the error
